scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of figures gathered around a woman in a blue robe and white veil, who is kneeling with her hands clasped in prayer. Above her, a dove descends, radiating light, symbolizing the Holy Spirit. Behind the kneeling woman, several other figures, some with halos, look on with expressions of awe and devotion. In the background, a wooden structure with inscribed text is visible, suggesting an interior setting. The overall composition evokes a moment of divine inspiration or revelation.
